name: Agnar Aamodt
content: Agnar Aamodt - NTNU Agnar Aamodt Download press photo Download press photo Foto: Close Agnar Aamodt Professor Emeritus agnar@ntnu.no +4792611144 IT-bygget, VIP-rommet, Gløshaugen, Sem Sælands vei 9 About Professor (retired) in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence. Affiliated with Norwegian Open AI Lab. Research Area Main research area is Artificial Intelligence, and in particular methods for data analysis and experience-based support of human problem solving and learning. In particular: Methods for experience capture and reuse of human experiences,and in particular case-based reasoning in combination with generalization-based methods Machine learning and data analysis Knowledge modelling and representation Cognitive Science Decision support systems Application areas in focus include medicine and health, fish farming, petroleum technology, search and rescue. Research Group: Data and Artificial Intelligence Additional information: www.idi.ntnu.no/~agnar Competencies Artificial intelligence Case-based reasoning Datamining Experience Transfer Knowledge acquisition Knowledge modelling Machine learning Publications Updated publications list in Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=XfI8SR8AAAAJ&hl=en 2017 Houeland, Tor Gunnar Høst; Aamodt, Agnar.
